LanguageData.XMonsters_SlightlyFastReload.label: reload speed - slightly fast
LanguageData.XMonsters_SlightlyFastReload.description:
Carriers of this gene reload any weapon slightly faster.
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_FastReload.label: reload speed - fast
LanguageData.XMonsters_FastReload.description:
Carriers of this gene fast reload any weapon.
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryFastReload.label: reload speed - very fast
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryFastReload.description:
Carriers of this gene very fast reload any weapon.
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperFastReload.label: reload speed - super fast
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperFastReload.description:
Carriers of this gene can reload any weapon almost instantly.
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_UnrealFastReload.label: reload speed - unreal fast
LanguageData.XMonsters_UnrealFastReload.description:
Before you can blink, he'll have reloaded that revolver.
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
